Name: In your Shadow
About the game: 'In your Shadow' is a Visual Novel point-and-click game that tells the story of three people: Lilly Emmett, Skyler Hasgrove, and Zachary Sorio. One night all three of their lives change in a second: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished and met with her sister's death again, and Zachary gets a fateful phone call. After teaming up to find who did these things to them, they find themselves in a life or death situation, and the player is lead through a comedic yet dramatic story with multiple endings.
Meta Title: In your Shadow: Dec 3, 2018, Zohar Neiger and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on In your Shadow? Check out the release date (Dec 3, 2018), developer insights from Zohar Neiger, and a complete game summary.
